name: set_budget
description: Set monthly spending budget with configurable alert thresholds. Get notified when you hit 50%, 75%, or 90% of your budget. Can also set daily limits and automatic actions.

user_id.description: User ID to set budget for (optional - defaults to current user)

daily_limit_usd.description: Optional daily spending limit in USD

auto_downgrade_at.description: Percentage threshold to auto-downgrade to cheaper models (optional)
